Summary._: Some southbound [2] trains via the [5] line from 149 St to Nevins St and [2] and [3] trains are delayed in both directions because of signal problems at 96 St.

Description._: Some southbound [2] trains via the [5] line from 149 St to Nevins St and [2] and [3] trains are delayed in both directions because of signal problems at 96 St.

LongDescription:
Some southbound [2] trains are stopping along the [5] line from 149 St-Grand Concourse to Nevins St.
[2] and [3] trains are running with delays in both directions.
These service changes are because of signal problems at 96 St.
Our crews are on scene making repairs and we hope to resume regular service soon. We will keep you updated.
